entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kuujjuarapik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:56 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.0°C
